text: Small businesses need help to weather this crisis so when this is all over, our community can recover. We passed legislation that has billions in assistance for small business and my office can help. I was glad to talk with @WFAA about my work to get you the resources you need. https://t.co/PRzGdZGpar

Listening to North Texans, answering questions and helping you navigate this difficult time is my top priority. If you missed my telephone town hall on #COVID19 last week, take a listen and if you need help w/ federal programs call my office: 972-972-7949. https://t.co/0Rh42wOspD

After several months of work we were able to secure an agreement to create the new Garland VA Medical Center. It will help the VA and our community fight #COVID19 and in the long term create jobs and serve 184,000 veterans. Watch my interview with @FOX4. https://t.co/5Mo1CYq0tC

In the long term, this is a victory for our veterans and @garlandtxgov. I'm proud of our North Texas community as everyone involved has rolled up their sleeves to get this agreement across the finish line. It will create thousands of jobs and help serve 184,000 veterans. (4/5)
I want to thank Dr. Richard Stone at the Veterans’ Health Administration, Dr. Stephen Holt and Kendrick Brown at the North Texas VA and Baylor, Scott and White for helping to get this done. (3/5)
We must marshal all the resources we have to beat this virus, and in the near-term, this will help our community as we fight the spread of COVID-19 and provide care for those who need it. (2/5)

The North Texas VA has acquired the Baylor Scott & White Hospital in Garland, which will now be known as the Garland VA Medical Center. I was proud to work with the VA and lead the charge to get this done. (1/5) https://t.co/GoUbXrbk5A
